column1: The Timeless Halls are the dwelling of Ilúvatar
column2: as distinct from the Void. They have existed before and outside the boundaries of the Eä
column3: and may or may not have a physical form. Although without limit
column4: they are said to stretch from the Abyss to the Firmament.

column1: In Bilbo Baggins Song of Eärendil
column2: the Ilmarin of Manwë and Varda are referred to as "The Timeless Halls."
